title: Chestnut ganache with ginger cake

For the chocolate sauce: stem ginger ice cream, to serve

steps: To make the ganache, whisk the cream until it holds soft peaks, then fold through the chestnut purée.
Sandwich half the ganache mixture between the two slices of ginger cake. Add the remaining ganache to the top layer.
For the chocolate sauce, melt the chocolate in a pan with the cream, then pour over the ginger cake layers.
Serve with a scoop of ice cream.
